stoicism.text: 你無法控制外在事件，但能掌握自己的反應。
stoicism.text_en: You have power over your mind - not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
stoicism.author: 馬可·奧勒留

stoicism.text: 真正的幸福不在於擁有，而在於內心的寵靜。
stoicism.text_en: True happiness is to enjoy the present, without anxious dependence upon the future.
stoicism.author: 塞內卡

buddhism.text: 痛苦不是必然，苦難是選擇。
buddhism.text_en: Pain is inevitable, suffering is optional.
buddhism.author: 佛陀

buddhism.text: 活在當下，才能真正活著。
buddhism.text_en: The present moment is the only time over which we have dominion.
buddhism.author: 一行禪師

taoism.text: 道法自然，無為而無不為。
taoism.text_en: Nature does not hurry, yet everything is accomplished.
taoism.author: 老子

taoism.text_en: He who knows contentment is rich.
taoism.author: 老子

confucianism.text_en: What you do not want done to yourself, do not do to others.
confucianism.author: 孔子

existentialism.text: 生命本無意義，意義由你賦予。
existentialism.text_en: Life has no meaning. Each of us has meaning and we bring it to life.
existentialism.author: 尼采

existentialism.text: 存在先於本質，你是你所選擇的。
existentialism.text_en: Existence precedes essence. You are what you choose to be.
existentialism.author: 沙特
